location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3532 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a reminder to the Resident to send without further delay his report on British relations with the native tribes of the Persian Gulf to the Government and to Sir Henry Montgomery Lawrence, if he has not already done so.
